archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Arrange and Manage Access from external parties to Service Provider Provisioning Tools and Processes
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Performing the supervision of the interfaces from external parties to Service Provider support tools in order to keep always up and running the accessibility.
